lyrics:
5 contributorsi am yours lyricsverse 1
i see your fingerprints
the work of your hands
its all in your hands
i see the evidence
leaving nothing to chance
the worlds in your hands

prechorus
so i rest in your promises
now i am sure of this im yours

chorus
let the waters rise
i will stand as the oceans roar
let the earth shake beneath me
let the mountains fall
you are god over the storm
and i am yours

verse 2
i hear the voice of love
calling me home
to where i belong
it cripples every fear
and the ones who will kneel
will walk away healed
see lauren daigle liveget tickets as low as 37you might also likeprechorus
so i rest in your promises
now i am sure of this im yours
no power is strong enough
to separate me from your love im yours

chorus
so let the waters rise
i will stand as the oceans roar
let the earth shake beneath me
let the mountains fall
you are god over the storm
and i am yours

bridge
even the thunder and the wind obey
at the command of my father father
i set my feet upon your mighty name
so let the rain fall harder harder
so take my everything my flesh and blood
ill lay me down on the altar altar
i am forever covered in your love
so let the rain fall

chorus
so let the waters rise
i will stand as the oceans roar
let the earth shake beneath me
let the mountains fall
you are god over the storm
and i am yours
let the waters rise
i will stand as the oceans roar
let the earth shake beneath me
let the mountains fall
you are god over the storm
and i am yours

you are god over the storm
and i am yoursembed
